The plants typically grow in mountainous regions and are adapted to temperate climates. Their leaves are often lance-shaped and arranged alternately along the stems. Holoschkuhria species are valued for their ornamental appeal and are sometimes cultivated in gardens for their delicate, colorful blooms.
